repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Proceedings of two panel sessions held on the morning of May 24, 1965, and two panel sessions held on the morning of May 25, 1965.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Conference on Industry and Government #/3083. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5059: U.S. Emergency Board No. 142 Records 5262: Matthew Woll Papers 6007: U.S. Department of Labor Office of American Workplace Labor Management Cooperation Collected Publications 6047: Archives Information File

controlaccess.subject: Decision making -- United States
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

did.unittitle: The Federal Research and Development Programs : the Decision making Process
Conference on Industry and Government Participation in Expanded Programs of Mass Transportation, Water Resources Development and Urban Development

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: May 24, 1965, Panel I: Mass Transportation, Dale Corson, Chairman. May 25, 1965, Panel I: Water Resource Development, Alice Cook, Chairman.

did.unittitle: Conference on Industry and Government Participation in Expanded Programs of Mass Transformation, Water Resources Development and Urban Development

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: May 24, 1965, Panel II: Water Resource Development, Franklin A. Long, Chairman. May 25, 1965, Panel II: Urban Development, Burnham Kelly, Chairman
